jchess.common

Interface IBoardAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBoard
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardAgent

    public interface IBoardAgent
extends IBoard
    IBoardAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken. It ensures that user does not make any changes to underlying data object.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
